oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Different Bushman Medicines; where found; and their uses. Only the names of these medicines are given in Bushman, and the remarks respecting them in English, after =kasin (L IV.-1. 3425-3440). These specimens were found in the hut of a Bushman sorcerer, and were kindly furnished for identification by Mr. J Gibb. //kabbos names for the same specimens, with his remarks (in English only), are in a separate paper of 7 folio pages, to which =kasins notes have been also briefly added, in red ink. A series of numbered entries describing the making of preparations from, as well as the use and collection of, various plants and insects for the treatment of a variety of ailments by the |xam.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Medicines taken by the ill
